entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
